name: SOLO ARENA
description:
The goal for this project is to check if there is a way to create a more believable artificial intelligence than what is usually seen in video games. Therefore a different technique has been used to develop one of the bots you are about the play against. The main thing we are trying to measure is how believable the bots are acting. In other words, how humanly they behave. 

Survey: https://forms.gle/DXrCiMWgwuoRFmhS6

Thanks in advance
